content:
Hướng nghiên cứu: 

1. Nghiên cứu về các giải thuật tối ưu dựa trên metaheuristic

2. Nghiên cứu về mạng định tuyến cơ hội Opportunity Networks Routing

3. Nghiên cứu ứng dụng Python vào lập trình các ứng dụng mạng

Research interests:

-  Information Retrieval

-  Information Extraction

-  Question answering systems

- Information Secutiry

Selected Publications:

1.  PhuPham, PhucDo, Chien, Ta Duy Cong, "LDA-GOW: Improvement in Topic Models by Applying Graph-of-words in Document Representation", Advanced Science Letters Journal, 2017, ISSN 1936-6612, E-ISSN: 1936-7317

 

2. Chien. Ta Duy Cong, Tuoi Phan Thi, “Automatic Extraction of  Semantic Relations from Text Documents”, In Proc. of the 3rd International Conference on Future Data and Security Engineering (FDSE 2016), Springer Verlag, LNCS, vol. 10018, Nov 2016.



3.  Chien. Ta Duy Cong, Tuoi. Phan Thi, “Improving the Algorithm for Mapping of OWL to Relational Database Schema”, in The 11th International Conference on Machine Learning and Data Mining (MLDM 2015), Springer-Verlag, LNAI, vol. 9166, July 2015



4. Chien. Ta Duy Cong, Tuoi. Phan Thi, “Building Information Extraction System Based on Computing Domain Ontology”, In Proc. of the 16th International Conference on Information Integration and Web-based Applications & Services (iiWAS 2014), IEEE, ACM, Nov 2014



5.  Chien. Ta Duy Cong, Tuoi. Phan Thi, “Identifying The Topic of Queries Based On Domain Specify Ontology”, WIT Transactions on Information and Communication Technologies, vol. 58, 2013



6.  Chien. Ta Duy Cong, Tuoi. Phan Thi, “Improving the Formal Concept Analysis Algorithm to Construct Domain Ontology”, In Proc. of the 5th  International Conference on Knowledge and Systems Engineering (KSE 2012), IEEE,  Sep 2012.

Mạng không dây (Wireless Network)

Mạng vô tuyến nhận thức (Cognitive Network)

Tối ưu hóa (Optimizations)

Link download tài liệu học tập

1- https://sites.google.com/site/dinhhanh11/

-  Network clustering

-  Network administration

RESEARCH INTERESTS


	Wireless Sensor Network (WSN)
	Underwater Wireless Sensor Network (UWSN)
	
		Media Access Control (MAC) layer for UWSN
		Network clustering
		In-network data aggregation
	
	
	Internet of Things (IoT)
	Kinect for Windows

Lĩnh vực nghiên cứu


	Định tuyến chuyển mạch nhãn đa giao thức.
	Ứng dụng Cloud computing, các vấn đề an toàn và bảo mật trên Cloud.
